## SyncableBuffer class

GPU data store with CPU-side data representation, enabling easy up/downloading.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class SyncableBuffer<T extends BufferSrcData = BufferSrcData> extends Buffer 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Buffer

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)({ target, usage, data, context, initializeAsValid, })](./webgl.syncablebuffer._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>SyncableBuffer</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./webgl.syncablebuffer.data.md) |  | T | CPU-side representation of the data. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [invalidate(start, end)](./webgl.syncablebuffer.invalidate.md) |  | Marks a given range of the buffer as invalid. If parts of the buffer have already been invalidated, the range containing all parts will be invalidated. |
|  [upload()](./webgl.syncablebuffer.upload.md) |  | Uploads the range marked as invalid to the GPU buffer. |
